property.caption: Folder
property.description: The folder containing the stylesheets (such as: /custom/style/css). A trailing slash is added automatically

property.caption: Default css
property.description: The default CSS stylesheet (such as: default.css).

property.caption: Remove default css
property.description: Remove the default css when loading a new one (if the custom stylesheet is equal to the default stylesheet it will not be removed from the DOM).

property.caption: URL Entity
property.description: The entity in which the URL will be saved

property.caption: URL Attribute
property.description: The attribute in which the URL will be saved

property.caption: Microflow
property.description: The microflow to execute in order to find a different stylesheet. Expects URL entity, returns filename.
